changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text

index.md.Ce plugin est un plugin permettant une c: This plugin is a plugin allowing compatibility with the Odace wireless range without battery from Schneider
index.md.Afin d'utiliser le plugin, vous devez le: In order to use the plugin, you must download, install and activate it like any Jeedom plugin
index.md.La chose la plus importante sur la page: The most important thing on the configuration page is to select your bluetooth device
index.md.Il est très important d'utiliser un dong: It is very important to use a bluetooth dongle dedeicated to this plugin for a consistent experience
index.md.Vous pouvez aussi vérifier l'état des dé: You can also check the status of dependencies and relaunch them
index.md.En cas de soucis avec le plugin toujours: In case of problems with the plugin always relaunch the dependencies even if OK when in doubt
index.md.Rendez vous dans le menu plugins\/protoc: Go to the plugins / protocol menu to find the plugin
index.md.Sur cette page vous pourrez voir les mod: On this page you can see the modules already included
index.md.Sur la partie haute de cette page vous a: On the upper part of this page you have several buttons
index.md.Permet d'intégrer un nouveau device: Allows you to integrate a new device
index.md.Bien mettre le device en question en app: Properly pair the device in question, in accordance with its documentation
index.md.Permet de se rendre directement sur la p: Allows you to go directly to the plugin configuration page
index.md.Ce bouton permet d'avoir un aperçu Santé: This button allows you to have a Health overview of all your modules
index.md.Permet d'interroger les devices pour con: Allows you to interrogate the devices to know the scenes they have
Allows you to interrogate the devices to know the groups they have
index.md.Lorsque que vous cliquez sur un de vos m: When you click on one of your modules, you arrive on the configuration page of this module
index.md.Comme partout dans Jeedom vous pouvez ic: Like everywhere in Jeedom you can here on the left side
index.md.Donner un nom au module: Give a name to the module
index.md.L'activer\/le rendre visible ou non: Activate / make it visible or not
index.md.Sur la partie droite vous trouverez: On the right side you will find
index.md.Pour les interrupteurs le visuel est le: For switches the display is the same regardless of its type
index.md.Des infos spécifiques comme la version d: Specific information such as firmware version, model, unique module identifier, mac address
index.md.Dans le cas d'un actionneur vous trouver: In the case of an actuator you will also find information on "Pairing", if after inclusion it is not on "Paired" you can retry the pairing by clicking on the orange button "frame pairing" "having took care to pair the module
